definition: see 殼牌公司|壳牌公司[Qiao4 pai2 gong1 si1]

sentences.english: X60 pipe line steel used on the pipeline project of South China Sea by shell oil company.
sentences.chinese: 钢板应用于壳牌石油公司南海管道项目。

sentences.english: Shell has still not been able to say why the leak occurred in the first place.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌仍未能说清为何泄漏在第一处发生。

sentences.english: That includes Shell, its chief executive said last month.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括壳牌，其行政长官上个月说。

sentences.english: The Shell-sign resistance movement grew strong and raucous.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌广告牌抵制运动愈演愈烈。

sentences.english: The (Shell) Foundation has formed a partnership with environ (enviroment) to market the cook stoves.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌基金会和环境适应组织一起来推广这种炊炉。

sentences.english: Royal Dutch Shell already owns a 10 percent stake in Arrow's international business.
sentences.chinese: 皇家壳牌已然拥有亚罗公司国际业务10%的股份。

sentences.english: Shell Malleus comes in several viscosity grades and NLGI specifications.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌马力士系列具有多个粘度等级和NLGI规格。

sentences.english: The following table provides a quick reference for Shell Cassida products.
sentences.chinese: 下表为壳牌加适达产品一览表。

sentences.english: Around 40% of Shell’s daily production is now in the form of gas.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌大约40%的的日常产品都是以气体的形式存在。

sentences.english: which is the headquarters for Shell.
Shenhua and Shell last month signed a Memorandum of Understanding for a coal-to-liquids project.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，神华和壳牌签订了合作谅解备忘录。

sentences.english: Li Lusha is the Corporate Communications Manager and spokeswoman of Shell Companies in China.
sentences.chinese: 栗陆莎现任壳牌中国集团沟通事务经理兼新闻发言人。

sentences.english: To be able to replace a Shell (Oil Co.), you're going to need a lot of algae.
sentences.chinese: 得需要极多的海藻才能替代一家壳牌机油。

sentences.english: Shell Irus is a range of advanced fire resistant hydraulic fluids.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌爱乐施是一系列高级防火液压油产品。

sentences.english: The paper introduces mainly the administration system and management features of Shell Group.
sentences.chinese: 主要介绍了壳牌集团的管理体制和经营特点。

sentences.english: A Shell spokeswoman declined to comment on the negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 壳牌发言人对谈判不予置评。
